      • findNonContraTansactionIds

        @Query(value="select DISTINCT j.transactionId from JournalEntry j where j.transactionId not in (select DISTINCT je.transactionId from JournalEntry je where je.glAccount.id = :contraId)")
java.util.List<java.lang.String> findNonContraTansactionIds(@Param(value="contraId")
